trans-unit.source: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.
trans-unit.target: 受信要求が処理するか同期または非同期でサービスを指定するバインディングを実装できるオプションのコントラクトを定義します。

trans-unit.source: In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 場合によっては、同期とメッセージを処理するバインディングのより効率的な場合があります<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>または<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>メソッド</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> class can optionally implement IBindingRuntimePreferences to indicate to callers that this is preferred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>クラスは、IBindingRuntimePreferences 優先である呼び出し元に示すために必要に応じて実装できます</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>。

trans-unit.source: If a binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods.
trans-unit.target: バインディングが IBindingRuntimePreferences、実装していない場合、[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]サービス モデル ランタイム層の既定値は、非同期バージョンを使用して、`Receive`と`Request`メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: If a binding does implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) or the asynchronous versions (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: バインドは IBindingRuntimePreferences を実装する場合、[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]サービス モデル ランタイム層は、の値を調べて<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>を使用して、これらの同期バージョンを呼び出すかどうかを決定し、メソッド (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>または<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) または非同期バージョン (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A><xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29><xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A><xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>または</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>と</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If IBindingRuntimePreferences is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods to receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: IBindingRuntimePreferences がバインドによって実装される、返された場合`true`から、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>プロパティ、お勧め、同期を使用すること<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>と<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>チャネルからメッセージを受信するメソッド</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences or returns `false` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: IBindingRuntimePreferences やを返しますが、バインディングに実装していない場合`false`から、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>プロパティ、お勧め、非同期を使用すること<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A>と<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>または<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>と<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>メソッド</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented.
trans-unit.target: によって返される値に関係なく、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>プロパティ、すべてのバインドする必要があります有効の実装を提供の同期および非同期バージョンの両方、`Receive`実装されている特定のチャネルの種類の方法です</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: カスタム チャネルの実装の詳細については、次を参照してください。[開発チャネル](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)です。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: より効率的に同期的または非同期的に受信した要求を処理するかを示す値を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously.
trans-unit.target: によって提供される標準 (システム提供) のバインディング[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]このインターフェイスを実装しているし、場合によっては、受信メッセージを同期的に処理する既定値をオーバーライドします。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要求をより効率的に同期的に処理する場合それ以外の場合<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to handle requests asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 既定値は<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>に要求を非同期的に処理します。
